    • Method Detail

      • buildNoteResource

        public static NoteResource buildNoteResource(NoteData note)
                                      throws AuthorizationException,
                                             NoteNotFoundException
        Create a resource object for a userListItem to send back only the values specified by the webservice definition
        Parameters:
        note - is a note object that contains also user/author specific data
        Returns:
        a noteResourceInstance that will be used to send back to the requester
        Throws:
        NoteNotFoundException - in case the note was removed after filling the NoteData object
        AuthorizationException - in case the access rights to the topic/note were changed after filling the NoteData object

      • buildNoteResponse

        public static javax.ws.rs.core.Response buildNoteResponse(javax.ws.rs.core.Request request,
                                                          NoteModificationResult result)
                                                   throws ResponseBuildException,
                                                          ExtensionNotSupportedException
        Build the response of an note. Response status can be OK, WARNING or ERROR.
        Parameters:
        request - Request
        result - NoteModificationStatus
        Returns:
        Response
        Throws:
        ResponseBuildException - exception while building the response
        ExtensionNotSupportedException - extension is not supported

      • setAttachmentsFromSession

        public static void setAttachmentsFromSession(String attribute,
                                             javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                             NoteStoringTO noteStoringTO)
        Adds an list with attachment identifier to NoteStoringTO. The set of attachment identifier gets this function from an specific session attribute. The key of the attribute is the parameter of NoteResource.
        Parameters:
        attribute - of session
        session - HttpSession
        noteStoringTO - NoteStoringTO
